short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New: Editor/IDE for creating progressive web apps, and web sites. (JavaScript, Node JS, HTML CSS)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Editor/IDE for JavaScript, HTML/CSS and Node.JS

FTP/SFTP/FTPS, and Google Drive support.

Built in version control and static site generator.

Each user gets their own shell account for hosting web sites and running Node.JS apps.

This is a NEW editor/IDE implemented from scratch. Currently in Alpha. 
Please send feedback and issues to e-mail editor@webtigerteam.com or call +46 738 498 018 for support.

This is a "hosted" app running in the browser and requires a Internet connection.
But it can also run "on premise" (you can for example host it on your phone/laptop/PC and let users login via wifi)

More info:
https://webtigerteam.com/editor/
https://webide.se/about/about.htm
https://www.npmjs.com/package/webide.se
